form.label: Deployment Clients
form.description: Filterable view of deployment clients. Can drill down to view client configs.

search.query: | rest /services/deployment/server/clients splunk_server=* | search hostname=$filter_value$ OR splunk_server=$filter_value$ OR clientName=$filter_value$ OR ip=$filter_value$ OR dns=$filter_value$ OR utsname=$filter_value$
table hostname, splunk_server, clientName, ip, dns, utsname | stats count by splunk_server

eval seconds=round(time() - lastPhoneHomeTime) | eval hostname=upper(hostname), duration=tostring('seconds',"duration") | table hostname, splunk_server, clientName, ip, dns, utsname, duration | rename hostname as Hostname, dns as DNS, ip as IP, clientName as "Client Name", utsname as "Host OS", splunk_server as "Deployment Server", duration as "Duration Since Last Check-In" | sort Hostname | rename account_id as "AWS Account" vpc_id as "AWS VPC" Comment as "Infoblox Comment"

`dmc_get_forwarder_tcpin` hostname=$filter_value$ OR sourceIp=$filter_value$ | eval source_uri = hostname.":".sourcePort | eval dest_uri = host.":".destPort | eval connection = source_uri."->".dest_uri | stats values(fwdType) as fwdType, values(sourceIp) as sourceIp, latest(version) as version, values(os) as os, values(arch) as arch, dc(dest_uri) as dest_count, dc(connection) as connection_count, sparkline, avg(tcp_KBps) as avg_tcp_kbps, avg(tcp_eps) as avg_tcp_eps by hostname, guid | eval avg_tcp_kbps = round(avg_tcp_kbps, 2) | eval avg_tcp_eps = round(avg_tcp_eps, 2) | `dmc_rename_forwarder_type(fwdType)` | rename hostname as Instance, fwdType as "Forwarder Type", sourceIp as IP, version as "Splunk Version", os as OS, arch as Architecture, guid as GUID, dest_count as "Receiver Count", connection_count as "Connection Count", sparkline as "Events Sparkline", avg_tcp_kbps as "Average KB/s", avg_tcp_eps as "Average Events/s" | sort Instance

| rest /services/deployment/server/clients splunk_server=* | search hostname=$hostname_tok$ | transpose | search (column=serverClasses.* "row 1"=enabled) OR column=package OR column=instanceName OR column=utsname OR column=hostname OR column=clientName OR (column=applications.*.timestamp "row 1"=*) | table column,"row 1" | sort - "row 1" | rename column as Attribute, "row 1" as Value

transpose | search (column=serverClasses.* "row 1"=enabled) OR (column=applications.* "row 1"=Install) OR (column=serverClasses.* "row 2"=enabled) OR (column=applications.* "row 2"=Install) OR (column=serverClasses.* "row 3"=enabled) OR (column=applications.* "row 3"=Install) | rename "row 1" as row1, "row 2" as row2, "row 3" as row3 | eval Value=coalesce(row1, row2, row3) | table column, Value | sort - Value | rename column as Attribute

table.title: Hosts with the application or serverClass $groupQuery$

search.query: | rest /services/deployment/server/clients splunk_server=* | search $groupQuery$=* | fields hostname,ip,lastPhoneHomeTime,utsname | eval lastPhoneHomeTime=strftime(lastPhoneHomeTime,"%Y-%m-%d")
